wikipedia_page.main:
James Glover (born 2 December 1993) is a professional rugby league footballer who plays as a centre for the York City Knights in the Betfred Championship.
Glover has previously played for the Dewsbury Rams and spent time on loan at the Hemel Stags in Kingstone Press League 1.
